bundle.shortDescription: Modern Multi-Protocol File Client with AI, Encryption & Cloud Storage
bundle.longDescription: AeroFTP is a cross-platform desktop client for FTP, FTPS, SFTP, WebDAV, S3, Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, MEGA, Box, pCloud, Azure Blob, and Filen — 13 protocols, 30 presets, one app. Features include AeroVault (AES-256-GCM encrypted containers), Cryptomator vault support, AeroAgent AI assistant with 24 tools and 7 providers, Monaco code editor, integrated terminal, dual-pane file browser, AeroCloud personal sync, archive browser (ZIP/7z/TAR/RAR), 51 languages, and dark mode. Built with Rust (Tauri 2) + React 18. Open source under GPL-3.0.
